Plot: A documentary comparing the highly profitable American health care industry to other nations, and HMO horror stories including shotgun deaths.
Title: Sicko
Actors: Michael Moore, Tucker Albrizzi, Tony Benn, George W. Bush
tomatoConsensus: Driven by Michael Moore's sincere humanism, Sicko is a devastating, convincing, and very entertaining documentary about the state of America's health care.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 14 nominations.
